name: The Lost Cave of Altamira
description:
A fun 2D dungeon crawler / platformer created with GameMaker Studio.

Collect treasure while evading or fighting creepy creatures! 

Defeat the final boss!

Collect as many diamonds as you can to get your high score! Or speedrun through to beat your fastest time!

Created with Benjamin Anderson's amazing course 'Become a Game Maker with GameMaker Studio'. I highly recommend you check out his courses.

Music: Oppressive Gloom Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
